name: cart update without button
author: Rezwan Shiblu

sections.description:
cart page cart box quantity calculation without update button extention for woocommerce

Using the Plugin

  • Download the plugin, install and active.

  • Now go to shop > page > cart, location URL would be like below –

    http://yourwebsite.domain/cart/

  • Now you will see few default setup.
sections.installation:
You may install the plugin using one of the three following methods:

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Then activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
What is woo-commerce?

WooCommerce helps you sell products and services from your WordPress site. It’s a free WordPress plugin with additional features available as extensions. WooCommerce is made by Automattic, the corporate arm of WordPress, so when you use it, you’re in good hands.

Is it Woocommerce dependent plugin?

Yes, You must install and active woocommerce plugin to make this plugin work.

Is cart page cart box quantity will be updated automatically?

Yes, the cart will be updated automatically like this:
